item.title: [317] Commands help & Telleport help [317]
item.dc:creator: @Lewis3 Lewis)
item.description:
@Lewis3 wrote:

[quote=“Robban1, post:2, topic:295788”]I can help you with both i think:s

For BOnus: First open “Item.CFG”
Then Search for the weapon like, bronze_dagger.
Then you will seee this:

item = 1204	Iron_dagger	Iron_dagger.	30.1373543294999	30.1373543294999	32.7861441104133	5	3	-4	1	0	0	0	0	1	0	4	0

okay, after the -4 1, change the <zero’s> to like 999 to make the stat 999 and change all 0’s for all stats. i think that 1 is attack 2 is str but i amnt sure.

Okay that with teleports, if you mean commands, then search for if (command.startsWith(“home”)) { if its home And under that you will see: teleportToX = 2852;
teleportToY = 3348; Thats the coords. Just change them(to get hte coords you want type ::mypos[/quote]

Thanks , but what i ment with teleports is what the delta teleports telleport you to like u click “minigames” it opens up a interface and it says “barrows” and when you click on “barrows” it teleports you somewhere but i dont know where i would change it.

Read full topic

item.title: [317] Commands help & Telleport help [317]
item.dc:creator: @Robban1 Robban1
item.description:
@Robban1 wrote:

I can help you with both i think:s

For BOnus: First open “Item.CFG”
Then Search for the weapon like, bronze_dagger.
Then you will seee this:

item = 1204	Iron_dagger	Iron_dagger.	30.1373543294999	30.1373543294999	32.7861441104133	5	3	-4	1	0	0	0	0	1	0	4	0

okay, after the -4 1, change the <zero’s> to like 999 to make the stat 999 and change all 0’s for all stats. i think that 1 is attack 2 is str but i amnt sure.

Okay that with teleports, if you mean commands, then search for if (command.startsWith(“home”)) { if its home And under that you will see: teleportToX = 2852;
teleportToY = 3348; Thats the coords. Just change them(to get hte coords you want type ::mypos

Read full topic

item.title: [317] Commands help & Telleport help [317]

item.description:
@Lewis3 wrote:

Hey guys i need help on my 317 server i need to change what the bonus of a wep is and im not sure how to can anyone point me in the right direction please ,

and also if anyone knows how i would change where delta telleports , telleport you to i have this -

case 73116: case 6005: // training teleport c.sendQuest("Barrows", 15240); c.sendQuest("Fight pits", 15241); c.sendQuest("Pest ctrl", 15239); c.sendQuest("Assault", 15243); c.sendQuest("", 15242); c.setSidebarInterface(6, 3209); // magic tab (ancient = 12855) c.interfaceGame = 2;

and i would like to know how to change where “barrows” telleports you to , thanks

  • lewis.
